description: This file contains unit tests for the custom React hook useBootcampResources, utilizing @testing-library/react-hooks and mocking interactions with a Supabase client.

methods.name: addLink
methods.description: Method to add a link resource, validates HTTPS URL, invokes API, and returns created resource.

methods.name: addFile
methods.description: Method to add a file resource, requires file fields, interacts with Supabase, and returns the created resource.
